oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate twenty dollar note
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This Confederate $20 note has an image of a sailor leaning on a capstan in the lower left corner and an image of a three-masted ship in the center. It has "20" in the upper right and "XX" in the lower right, and was payable "Six Months after the Treaty of; Peace." This note is number 1407.
